title: Allowing God to Paint Your Financial Picture
itunes:summary:
In marriage, it takes relying on God's wisdom to make wise choices. The same can be said for the financial choices you make. Erin Smalley and John Fuller discuss how to rely on God when you need to make big decisions on money. Featuring guests Jeff and Shaunti Feldhahn.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Jeff and Shaunti Feldhahn's book "Thriving in Love & Money" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-06-22?refcd=1113805

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/allowing-god-to-paint-your-financial-picture/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
